basejump

Read Sample Metadata File

Read Sample Metadata File

readSampleMetadataFile(object, ...)

# S4 method for character
readSampleMetadataFile(object, lanes = 1,
  quiet = FALSE)

Arguments

object

Metadata file. Supports CSV and XLSX file formats.
...

Additional arguments (for the S4 generic definition).
lanes

Optional. Number of lanes used to split the samples into technical replicates (_LXXX) suffix.
quiet

If TRUE, suppress any status messages and/or progress bars.

Value

data.frame.

See also

Other Data Import and Project Utilities: loadRemoteData, readFileByExtension, readGFF, readYAML, transmit

Examples

# Demultiplexed
demultiplexed <- file.path(
    "http://basejump.seq.cloud",
    "sample_metadata",
    "demultiplexed.xlsx")
readSampleMetadataFile(demultiplexed)
#> Reading demultiplexed.xlsx
#>          sampleID sampleName description            fileName genotype
#> sample_1 sample_1   sample 1    sample 1 sample1_R1.fastq.gz wildtype
#> sample_2 sample_2   sample 2    sample 2 sample2_R1.fastq.gz wildtype
#> sample_3 sample_3   sample 3    sample 3 sample3_R1.fastq.gz   mutant
#> sample_4 sample_4   sample 4    sample 4 sample4_R1.fastq.gz   mutant

# Multiplexed (e.g. inDrop single-cell RNA-seq)
multiplexed <- file.path(
    "http://basejump.seq.cloud",
    "sample_metadata",
    "multiplexed.xlsx")
readSampleMetadataFile(multiplexed)
#> Reading multiplexed.xlsx
#>                      sampleID sampleName description         fileName index
#> run_1_CAGTTATG run_1_CAGTTATG   sample 2       run 1 run1_R1.fastq.gz    18
#> run_1_TTACCTCC run_1_TTACCTCC   sample 1       run 1 run1_R1.fastq.gz    17
#> run_2_ATAGCCTT run_2_ATAGCCTT   sample 5       run 2 run2_R1.fastq.gz    14
#> run_2_CTTAATAG run_2_CTTAATAG   sample 4       run 2 run2_R1.fastq.gz    13
#> run_2_TAAGGCTC run_2_TAAGGCTC   sample 6       run 2 run2_R1.fastq.gz    15
#> run_2_TCGCATAA run_2_TCGCATAA   sample 7       run 2 run2_R1.fastq.gz    16
#> run_2_TCTTACGC run_2_TCTTACGC   sample 3       run 2 run2_R1.fastq.gz    12
#>                sequence  revcomp
#> run_1_CAGTTATG CATAACTG CAGTTATG
#> run_1_TTACCTCC GGAGGTAA TTACCTCC
#> run_2_ATAGCCTT AAGGCTAT ATAGCCTT
#> run_2_CTTAATAG CTATTAAG CTTAATAG
#> run_2_TAAGGCTC GAGCCTTA TAAGGCTC
#> run_2_TCGCATAA TTATGCGA TCGCATAA
#> run_2_TCTTACGC GCGTAAGA TCTTACGC
